findings.title: C01. Invalid Calculations
findings.description: Incorrect calculations in _availableTokens() and _availableTokensForNextEpoch() functions.

findings.title: H02. Token Supply Manipulation
findings.description: In newVesting() and arbitraryTransfer() functions, the requirement to only release unlocked tokens is executed incorrectly.

findings.title: M02. Missing Validation
findings.description: The project should be consistent and contain no self-contradictions; missing validations for certain variables.

findings.title: M03. Non-Finalized Code
findings.description: TODO comments in the code imply that it is not finalized and additional changes will be introduced in the future.

findings.title: M04. Requirements Violation; Invalid Hardcoded Value
findings.description: The amount released each year does not match the required annual percentage decrease of 20%.

findings.title: L01. Floating Pragma
findings.description: Locking the pragma helps ensure that contracts do not accidentally get deployed using, for example, an outdated compiler version.

findings.title: L02. Unscalable Functionality - Same Checks In Functions
findings.description: Same checks used in several functions overwhelm code and make further development difficult.

findings.title: L03. Missing Zero Address Validation
findings.description: Address parameters are being used without checking against the possibility of 0x0.

findings.title: L04. Best Practice Violation
findings.description: The input arrays are not validated for having equal lengths, violating best practices.

findings.title: L05. State Variables Can Be Declared Immutable
findings.description: Variableâ€™s gVrsw and vrsw values can be declared as immutable to lower Gas usage.

findings.title: L06. Missing Validation
findings.description: Lack of validation of the _emissionStartTs argument in vGlobalMinter.sol constructor(); Emission should not start in the past.

findings.title: L07. Unauthorized Access
findings.description: The release() function can be called by anyone, allowing external users to release tokens on behalf of the beneficiary.

findings.title: Partial Lock of Rewards
findings.description: Calling setEpochParams() with block.timestamp can cause a partial lock of rewards paid when calling nextEpochTransfer().

findings.title: Unusable Staking System
findings.description: Changing the stakerFactory variable after it is set and in use will lead to an unusable staking system.

findings.title: L08. Missing Events
findings.description: Events for critical state changes should be emitted for tracking things off-chain.

findings.title: L09. NatSpec Comment Contradiction
findings.description: The NatSpec comments of the transferRewards() imply that the caller must be a registered staker with a non-zero allocation point.

findings.title: I01. Solidity Style Guide Violation - Single Quotes
findings.description: The project violates the style guidelines by using single quotes for strings.

findings.title: I02. Solidity Style Guide Violation - Contract Names
findings.description: The name of the contracts and types should begin with uppercase letters.

findings.title: I03. Indexed Inputs in Events
findings.description: Events have the possibility to track their inputs as indexed.

findings.title: I04. Misleading Function Parameter Name
findings.description: Function parameters should represent the function logic and should not mislead it.

findings.title: I05. Functions That Can Be Declared External
findings.description: Public functions that are never called in the contract should be declared as external.

findings.title: I06. Redundant Events
findings.description: In order to save Gas, code should not have unused events.

findings.title: I07. Unused Variable
findings.description: Unused variables should be removed from the contracts.

findings.title: I08. State Variables That Can Be Packed
findings.description: The state variables in the vChainMinter contract can be downcast and packed together to save Gas.

findings.title: I09. Redundant Import
findings.description: Unused imports should be removed from the contracts.

findings.title: I10. Redundant Payable
findings.description: Unused function's modifiers should be removed from the contracts.

findings.title: I11. Style Guide Violation - Order of Functions
findings.description: The project should follow the official code style guidelines.

findings.title: I12. Missing Getters
findings.description: Data from allStakers and vestingWallets can be accessed only by index.
